reviewText:
The 2004 Individual World Poetry Slam was the inaugural run of this event, a spin off of the annual National Poetry Slam. It began as it has continued: as a world-class showcase of the finest performance poetry around.

My only complaint with this DVD is that the sound quality is a little rough, but with performances of Rachel McKibbens' "Untidaled", Buddy Wakefield's "A Waste", and Celena Glenn's innovative "Roach Motel", among a great many others, it's a collection not only worth owning, but protecting from covetous friends.
